name: Amnext
description: Amnext is an ecosystem developed on the Binance Smart Chain that turns saving money into a game. The native token of the platform is the AMC which is an inflationary BEP-20 which is deflated by the multiple burning systems. The main scope of the project is to allow users gain profits without taking any risk! All of this is ensured by the No Loss Prize Pools, the Lifetime Lotteries and the AMC Machine. Users can deposit funds in USDT - BNB - CAKE - AMC in order to get lottery tickets and interests in the form of AMC. Everyone can withdraw the deposited amount without any type of loses. With the AMC token users can purchase Lifetime Tickets which entitle them to partecipate in the lifetime lottery drawings for the rest of their life and by inviting friends gain referral rewards!
